publicationStmt.availability: All texts included in this collection are in the public domain. The textual markup is provided with a Creative Commons Attribution International 4.0 (CC BY).

projectDesc.p: This is the English novel collection for the ELTeC, the European Literary Text Collection, produced by the COST Action Distant Reading for European Literary History (CA16204, https://distant-reading.net).
projectDesc.bibl: English Novel Corpus (ELTeC-eng), edited by Lou Burnard. In: European Literary Text Collection (ELTeC). COST Action Distant Reading for European Literature. Version 1.0.1, April 2021. URL: https://github.com/COST-ELTeC/ELTeC-eng, DOI: https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3533868.
